mainEntity.name: Can I use HTML to PDF without uploading files to a server?

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes. PDF Dayfiles tools run client-side in your browser, so processing happens locally on your device.

mainEntity.name: Is HTML to PDF free to use on PDF Dayfiles?

acceptedAnswer.text: Core usage is free and designed for quick personal or team workflows without complicated setup.

mainEntity.name: Does HTML to PDF work when internet is unstable?

acceptedAnswer.text: Most processing is local in-browser, so the workflow can continue even with weak connectivity after loading the tool.
